website_summaries.verdict: With Android 4.0, solid call quality, and waterproof capabilities, the Kyocera Hydro is a great prepaid device.
pros: The Kyocera Hydro from Boost and runs on Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich, is waterproof, and has excellent call quality
cons: The Hydro has slow data and processor speeds, its speaker volume is low, and its profile is thick

customer_reviews.title: Good starter phone
customer_reviews.text: This smart phone did what it was supposed to do but there were also some bad things about it. If you want a smartphone for a beginning user then this one is great. However the amount of room to store downloaded apps can become a problem. The phone tends to loose space if you have too many apps
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Beyond awful.
customer_reviews.text: Unusable. Very slow. Even if you plan to use it without any apps whatsoever, it's incredibly slow and what you do gets cancelled/interrupted all the time so you have to start over. So I gave up and just decided to use it at home. But the wireless keeps dropping, so you can't even use it at home to browse the internet or watch videos. It just keeps loading... and loading...
customer_reviews.author: Luisa

customer_reviews.title: Decent for price!
customer_reviews.text: Does not support certain games, won't download Roblox. Phone quality for. Other games is good, def waterproof, an sturdy phone for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: This was a waste of my money and a disappointment for my two ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these phone for my daughters for Christmas. When i tried to activate them through boost mobile, they were unable to do this. They stated the phones had must have been unlocked and couldnt be used with boost mobile. This was a waste of my money and a disappointment for my two girls.
customer_reviews.author: I love this

customer_reviews.title: This phone is the worst! The only thing good about it was the ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is the worst! The only thing good about it was the price but hey "you get what you pay for". I basically just needed a backup phone so that's just what it is... It always stop! Seem like no app is compatible and they all keep stopping. I have to go to a blank screen to talk on the phone because it goes to the dial pad and mute the phone. Omg it's just so much lol -_-
customer_reviews.author: happy customer

customer_reviews.title: It's great for the first month
customer_reviews.text: It's great for the first month, but then it freezes. Not only that, but then when you attempt to make a call, it doesn't, when you click on the contact again, the phone double calls the same contact. This phone is okay if you're alright with the way it functions, and the space is horrible. I have two downloaded apps from the Playstore, but it requires a Google Services update all the time and when you try to update, even after you delete your messages and pictures, you're still going to get a "cannot download, insufficient storage" message... No recommendation here.
customer_reviews.author: huh?

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was not impressed with this & was very small. Battery sucked. Touch screen didn't want to work half the time.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie freymuth

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Save your $ and headaches. Buyer beware. This phone does not work properly after a few weeks. It freezes up. It shuts down randomly. It fails to open apps. Check the phone's reviews on Boost Mobile website. You'll see a long list of people who are experiencing the same thing. Thank you, Amazon, for letting me return this faulty defective phone after three months. BTW, the problems started within a few weeks but over time have gotten progressively worse. I can hardly get my phone to work properly anymore. Requires pulling out the battery to reset. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Lilnova

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately...
customer_reviews.text: My husband and my 2 sons have this phone. My sons have no problems and say it is a perfect phone for Youtube, Facebook, Amazon, and Netflix. My husband's phone unfortunately is defective. It worked perfectly for awhile and then suddenly the speaker stopped. He has to use headphones or Bluetooth to use it. I would say 2 out of 3 good results aren't bad, but keep in mind that it means 1/3 is negative. I say the average is about normal for today's cell phone quality. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Kyocera Hydro Prepaid Android Phone (Boost Mobile)
customer_reviews.text: This is a good phone for some one whom has used a droid before. I guess to say next leverl from a beginer. You can do so much on this phone its not even funny. The only thing i don't like is some times I'm faster than the phone is which can cause a slight delay in what the task I'm trying to do. Not realy a freez up I don't guess...just a delay. The case of phone is slippery so you will need a phone cover. Other than that I would say try/buy it...you'll I think you'll like it...for the price you can't beet it.
customer_reviews.author: cupcake

customer_reviews.title: This phone does protect against water. But after a ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone does protect against water. But after a while, the memory got messed up and I had to erase apps just to get the phone working. You can't download many apps, so it leaves you with a very basic phone. It's ok, but I'm considering buying a new one after 2 years of having it.
customer_reviews.author: Nomad Cook

customer_reviews.title: The water proof phone for Washington People :)
customer_reviews.text: We got the phone new here for 50.00 cheaper then the Boost store , So far we have had it for over a month with no problems, Wife uses the gps everyday and it is dead on everytime and the battery last about 8 hours if you run the gps and phone and stuff same time it dose draw on the battery, we just plug in the car and go. The android system works great, Killer deal here, only took 3 days to come with the wait
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a dash cam. Long video recording and for only $15 can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: kyocera hydro
customer_reviews.text: The phone works great. I haven't had any problems with this phone, no dropped calls, no interruption on long distance calls. clear calls i am satisfied. Well to pick up where I left off it's been six months since I bought this phone and it does not work any more I don't know what happened between today and last night. but it went kapoot.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: is super slow. Impossible to get on social media
customer_reviews.text: This phone is awful. It shuts off, forecloses apps, is super slow. Impossible to get on social media. Spend the money for a better phone cause you get what you pay for with this one. Junk. It doesn't even FEEL like a phone. Super light weight and plasticy screen.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is awful! Do not waste your money. It worked fine for about a week and then started crashing all the time, refusing to load Googleplay Apps, and some games on Facebook, it has begun to send double texts even when I send just one and at times won't let me text or answer the phone at all. It is definitely not worth the headaches!
customer_reviews.author: oweemytoe

customer_reviews.title: Packaging and lack of true customer service
customer_reviews.text: Hi. Items received at 745 p on 7th. Very disappointed with packaging ..you could have certainly used a larger box instead of crushing the phones in there. Certainly $40 was plenty for ground shipping. I do not have an email stating about the shipping coming earlier, you as the seller should know you inflated that by 8 times but my 14 year old son was completely ripped off with the shipping delay for a school project. I can promise you you will not have my business again as if you just have refunded the shipping or part of it I wouldn't have been so upset.
customer_reviews.author: Superchick92

customer_reviews.title: Something is wrong here
customer_reviews.text: This phone is extremely glitchy and often basic functions on the phone stop working. Like the phone. And settings. And messaging. This phone will work for now, but I'm saving for an iphone. This will go to my 12 year old when I get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: LadyoftheLake

customer_reviews.title: Great Simple Cheap Waterproof Smartphone
customer_reviews.text: Like many of my Amazon purchases, I purchased this on a lightning deal for $40 to serve as my work phone. I was surprised to find that this is a great little android phone, and for the price it is superb. I also got a little risky and decided to test out the waterproof feature. I dropped the phone in a glass of water while it was still on and it came out working fine. I simply wiped it out and continued on with my life.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R

customer_reviews.title: Kyocera Hydro (Boost Mobile)
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for about one week now. It's perfect for a cheap prepaid phone. I watch videos and on occasion it might freeze after about eight+ hours of watching videos. No big just restart and continue with what you were doing on the phone. I do recommend this if you don't want to dish out a lot of money for a newer phone.
customer_reviews.author: ollie

customer_reviews.title: Include user-friendly information
customer_reviews.text: Is there a reason why the new phones don't include detailed instruction manuals on how to operate the phone, in addition to installing the battery, turning it on and setting up voicemail? Why not include information on how to go about sending multiple messages and setting up email accounts?
customer_reviews.author: rmcelder

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: i bought this phone as a back up for when my samsung galaxy phone breaks. The color quality of the phone cant beat the samsung. but i love the memory on the kyocera. i also love how the apps dont take up too much memory and that it has its own music player. I didnt get to try dunking it in water yet because i dont want to risk breaking it. but other then that the phone is a great price and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Hiipoi de Souza

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, and you're not paying much.
customer_reviews.text: Opening spotify took about 2 full minutes, and would constantly freeze along with other programs. If you just need a phone for calling/texting it shouldn't be an issue, but if you want it to do anything else then pay more.
customer_reviews.author: Rustjaw

customer_reviews.title: Juat what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone only thing it is I have a vision problem and the fonts are large enough for me. But I would recommend this phone to anyone who loves to play games, do lists, watch movies, etc. It has everything. The ringtones on the other hand are soft tones, will need to download your own ringers. All in all it is a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Nightmagic

customer_reviews.title: Wife Loves It
customer_reviews.text: There's really not a lot to say except that this phone works perfectly. My wife loves it and with Boost mobiles shrinking payment plan, she has an excellent cellphone, with unlimited calling and data, at a price that is well below the cost of any of the postpaid plans you will find.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: kyocera hydro
customer_reviews.text: The kyocera hydro is a decent phone and I chose it because is water proof. My teen daughter uses it and she likes it a lot. There's something to it; shuts down often and needs to be reset because otherwise it just freezes, this is the second one I buy and the previous one did the exact thing. The battery drains fast too, even without apps or frequent use. But it's affordable and ideal for a younger person.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Nice, cheap, little phone. Wish it had USB OTG
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone for projects that need Android 4.0. I use it as a GPS recorder; the waterproofing makes it especially durable. However, Clockwork Mod doesn't support it yet, and I doubt Kyocera will be providing many OS updates. Also, the screen resolution is kind of low, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua A

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: This phone crashes. A lot. Get past that, and its a decent phone on the cheap, but trying to be productive with this phone is asking for a disaster. Go a step up to the Hydro Edge if you can, because this is not what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: great phone be cautious about those sellers
customer_reviews.text: its a good phone i like it bcuz its waterproof but it doesn't hold much storage space but the only i give it a two stars is bcuz the owner sold me this phone that had a virus
customer_reviews.author: chad JJ

customer_reviews.title: Fast enough, waterproof, great price.
customer_reviews.text: The phone is great. It is not lightning fast, but I don't need it to be. I use it mostly on WiFi: Skype, email, a diagnostics app for my car. It is indeed waterproof. Kept it in my pocket while in the water (freshwater lake) for over 4 hours. Worked like a charm! Delivery was quick.
customer_reviews.author: A. Semeco

customer_reviews.title: Very good phone for the accident prone
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cheep phone! Fast and reliable. Don't thing you can use this in the shower though! The water hitting it will push buttons and once the screen is wet it's very hard to use. Never have to worry about dropping it in the toilet, and if you do you can disinfect it no worries!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla C.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone but it's to slow to download and Everytime we are using the phone it cuts off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... has so I ordered this one to make it easy to activate since he already have an account with ...
customer_reviews.text: same phone my son has so I ordered this one to make it easy to activate since he already have an account with boost mobile, the transition to this phone was easy, thanks
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Mixed
customer_reviews.text: Good phone, though the fact that you have to get an external memory for it and put it in kind of sucks. I rather like phones that pack enough internal memory not to need a memory card. Otherwise, pretty okay phone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good phone, good price
customer_reviews.text: Apart from a weak battery, I love this thing! The only thing it doesn't have( for my purposes) is auto-focus on the camera, but I didn't look for that when I bought it. It wasn't a "need" for me, but I've found some apps that require auto-focus to work. I've had it for a month, and dropped it several times, without incident (no armor casing) haven't put it to the water test yet, but I'm sure it will happen on its own. This is a 3G phone, but since BM doesn't have sufficient 4G coverage in the area, I have no complaints about connecting indoors or outside, I haven't lost a call since upgrading
customer_reviews.author: Steven Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: BEST PHONE I HAVE EVER HAD!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this phone to upgrade and was half expecting it not to live up to what boost said about it , boy was I shocked ! This phone lives up to the hype and goes far beyond what I was thinking. It will hold a 32 gig mini sd card, which if you have this you probably will not ever have to up grade again. Netflix plays with no problems and the way it plays music is out of this world ! Best investment in a phone that I have ever made .
customer_reviews.author: phil

customer_reviews.title: water proof as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: First thing i did was throw that sucker in my sink, if it failed the test i would've returned it, but i still got it. Does its job as a phone with phone calls and texts, multitasking and browser speeds show the phones lesser side on speed, but for the $35 it was definitely worth it. U get what u pay for no?
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Don't Get this phone!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this phone because I was trying to save money, but I promise it is a waste! I had it for about 3 weeks only and My alert tone no longer works although the phone says the volume is on full. I also want to point out it is very limited on features. You don't even have a camera self timer. Also the pictures themself are awful. I realize now tat sometimes it is better to just spend the extra cash and get a real phone. It has been three weeks and I am on here shopping for another phone!!!
customer_reviews.author: vinny

customer_reviews.title: Not really waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I guess this phone is the lowest tier of the smartphone family. I had this phone for a little over a year, I had to replace it after a month because the phone call program kept freezing and recently it took a swan dive into a toilet bowl and it did not survive the experience, so its not even waterproof. I guess it may resist tears if you are crying while you are talking. I guess its ok if you can get it for $10. Otherwise dont bother.
customer_reviews.author: Rafy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome affordable phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my mentally challenged daughter the price was right the water proof feature was a plus and it does everything she needs plus gives her Facebook and email on the go
customer_reviews.author: Mimi1220

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: love this Battery Charger just what i needed and the price was just right. love that i dont have to go out looking for it. saw it at a dept. store and did not want to pay so much money for it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Chiquito

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: This phone is pretty good for its price. I wasnt expecting much but I actually like it and on here it was like half the price of the phone carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: It works, and water doesn't kill it
customer_reviews.text: but it is not fast...at all. SLOW, but had it a year now and its still kicking. On the bright side the battery will last over a day, not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: great phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: great price for the phone and waterproof, I have had it for a month now without a single 'glitch". the only drawback I have found is the battery life but then it is an android phone and the batteries never last long on them
customer_reviews.author: Paul Carter

customer_reviews.title: Good Cellphone For The Price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this cell phone by Kyocera i think that for a android 3G cell phone its a good quality phone and i found that on this site its more affordable then if i had bought it at a local store or at the boost mobile web site!
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Kyocera smartphone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone to have for kids, it's water proof very durable and easy to use and at the price can't beat the price for this smartphone.. Would recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Alexis R.

customer_reviews.title: So slow its unusable
customer_reviews.text: It i so slow its unusable. I couldent downloa more that 2 apps without the phone completely lagging out. It dosebt work. I recomend spending your 20$ on a used iphone 4 from ebay. Trust me. Thats th swich i made and it worked much much much better
customer_reviews.author: Aidan

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to set it up with the assistance from my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Android cell phone I have had . It was easy to set it up with the assistance from my wife because I had little knowledge of them. Great value for the money and I would recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: App player
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a vehicle that could used by someone who only wanted to play with or use apps. It accesses wifi, downloads google apps, has good battery life. Have not used the calling features. Price was great for a lot of entertainment
customer_reviews.author: Teem10

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and drop proof
customer_reviews.text: I am careful with most everything, but my phone always ends up taking a toll and beating from so much use. And this phone is strong! Did I mention I am clutsy? I spilled water a couple times. Perfectly fine. Awesome phone!! :D
customer_reviews.author: Tatianna

customer_reviews.title: ... have a cell phone that is expensive and I hate it. I bought this one and the pictures ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a cell phone that is expensive and I hate it. I bought this one and the pictures I take with it are superb. The sound is wonderful and the apps are so easy to access on it. I love this and the price is something I just could not beat. I thought I was just buying a phone to get me by and it is now my phone to keep in fact, I am going to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Joni H.

customer_reviews.title: Worst phone ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is the worst phone I ever had. I just got this phone about a week and a half ago i bought it cause i cant afford an expensive one right now but you get what u pay for, i should of held off and waited.Drops phone calls The touch screen is terrible.the phones internet lags a lot .the screen shuts down and the phone is always freezing up! Can't wait to buy a different phone!
customer_reviews.author: Maryrose Romano

customer_reviews.title: Kyocera Aqua was very mediocre
customer_reviews.text: It freezes up quite a bit; applications will stop running and the phone will have to be restarted. Some apps don't work at all, and the browser is incredibly slow. It has the most difficulty with music and video, which was particularly disappointing for me. After this experience, i seriously doubt i would buy another phone online.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: It takes some time to figure out the navigation
customer_reviews.text: The phone is very good over all. It takes time to be able to figure out and find some of the features. It is not even close to any other phone I have had. My wife really likes it. I think my old phone was/is so much better. I am probably going to reconnect my old phone. My wife however doesn't ever want to give this phone up
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Its a good cellphone, very fast and with good picture and sound quality, unfortunately problems Quito my current communications company i havent been able to test call quality, however since the cellphone Its as good in all the other aspects as the seller say im giving the product a good rating.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Alvins

customer_reviews.title: "A Best Buy"
customer_reviews.text: I already have this cell phone, and just purchased this one for a back-up because the monthly insurance fee for my cell phone was just too much, and by buying this phone as a back-up it will save me lot's of money in the long run. "I do recommend this cell phone" if you need a solid performer that says "Hello", and "Yes" it gives you all the other bells & whistles too, but not the over priced price tag that you would pay at the cell phone service/provider company ! JM
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: sucks!
customer_reviews.text: This phone sucks! At first I thought it was cool, a water proof android for only $80.00!! but of course you get what you pay for. Its constantly going on mute in the middle of my phone calls. and always freezing up on me. I would rather pay a few extra bucks for something worth it. Wouldn't recommend anyone to by this unless all you do is text!
customer_reviews.author: Me Lisa

customer_reviews.title: GREAT phone!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this phone for sure. Super easy to use. It doesn't take great photos indoors, but outdoors it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyin733

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone works great, even for facebook. It's inexpensive and dependable. Great for a gift idea. My sis in law adores it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: WELL......
customer_reviews.text: When I got the phone and opened the package; then I went to put in my SD card; but the hinge was broken on the SD card slot. So, I love the phone (great signal strength, great apps, awesome download times, etc.) but, the fact that it would be able to be damaged that easy and was able to corrupt 2 SD cards. I only give it a 3 star rating. Had it been built better I would have given five.
customer_reviews.author: FREEQEJ

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive phone, work well, and able to upgrade memory to 32mb.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: Meets Expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for a very good price, Much better than the phone it replaced, which cost more. Would recommend it for folks on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Outdated OS
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a cheap replacement for my son. The OS is outdated. None of his apps are supported.
customer_reviews.author: Shun C.

customer_reviews.title: 3 weeks of problems
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have purcased this phone at a retail store. The $25.00 I saved I have spent going back and fourth to the retailer with problems Im still not sure are corrected. The phone shuts itself off while Im talking, the screen goes blank during texts and when I try to answer waiting calls! I have learned somethings are not to be purchased "online"!
customer_reviews.author: Zera Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: boost
customer_reviews.text: not bad for cheap droid cant beat price and its better then some phone iv seen for lot more money
customer_reviews.author: Chris jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased over 6 months ago and it's still working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: You will regret your purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how out of date this phone is. It freezes ALL the time and makes it impossible to make or receive phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: jlee

customer_reviews.title: The worst phone I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my 1st on from amazon, cheap 79.00, the phone kept freezing up, so, I exchanged, for a new one, the 2nd phone was worse, it is all the phones all tech in making it waterproof none in making it a usable phone
customer_reviews.author: Rainbow Usa

customer_reviews.title: excellent phone great purchase i have even had family purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent phone great purchase i have even had family purchase this phone and they love it
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good for a limited time
customer_reviews.text: This phone is ok to start off with or just to have until you can afford a good phone. After a while it starts to freeze, turn off, and the battery dies in a few hours when it is not in use.
customer_reviews.author: T. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: great starter into android
customer_reviews.text: Good phone if your new to android especially if your not sure if to get android of apple iOS but if you want games like a new gen smartphone this is not for you
customer_reviews.author: Jose salinas

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Basic phone, has all the features needed, slow, but it's only a 3G, expected. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sol G. Azuaje

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Phone isn't capable of handling heavy processing apps (playkids cartoon app)
customer_reviews.author: Rolling Thunder

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: This is my first real upgrade in phones. I did alot of comparing and this was the one for me. My daughter and son-in-law have had these phones before and they both are getting the hydro. Very user friendly !!!
customer_reviews.author: azkadelia58

customer_reviews.title: My son like the phone.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this phone to my son and he loves it. Its more than what he wanted. He had been with Sprint for a few years but his bill was crazy high.
customer_reviews.author: JD Southerland

customer_reviews.title: Christmas 2012
customer_reviews.text: My sisters first android and they are inseparable. She takes it everywhere with her. She also brags that her phone is more up to date than mine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Phone is very slow. when on a call the ...
customer_reviews.text: Phone is very slow.when on a call the layout of dialer is foolishly placed cheek calls other contacts, must use hands free in order to stay without interruptions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: music device.
customer_reviews.text: Its good for wat i use it for. A music player. i needed a new android device to use as a mp3 player because mine was getting outdated. so its good for wat i wanted it for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone very nice phone for a prepaid carrier I have had no trouble at all. definitly reccommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved this phone band now my son uses it !
customer_reviews.author: Ceiara Ranjel

customer_reviews.title: 😠😠😠
customer_reviews.text: The phone that i bought was extremely slow,freezes,and sometime turns off by itself
customer_reviews.author: karen Rodríguez

customer_reviews.title: Good but NOT Great!
customer_reviews.text: It's a really good phone but the volume is a little crappy and the keyboard is a bit small. But you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: hillary

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for my age group
customer_reviews.text: For a first time user it is easier than expected. I love it. Now I cannot do without it .
customer_reviews.author: Rev Maria Aytes

customer_reviews.title: no battery life / training needed
customer_reviews.text: Hardly use the phone but i have to charge it at least once a day. The only manual they provide is online and has not been able to fix many issues i've had when i've used it. This is my 1st smartphone; so i figured i'd have some issues, but this is ridiculous

customer_reviews.title: Kyocera Hydro
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with how quick I received the phone in the mail. The only thing is that the phone has many glitches. Most of the time when I'm on the phone people can't hear me or it will just hang up on its own. Other than that the phone is pretty good.

customer_reviews.title: The phone works/Amazon prime not so much...
customer_reviews.text: The phone works and does what it's supposed to do. My only complaint is how long it took me to actually get the phone. I got the phone a week and a half after the projected date and that was after signing up for Amazon prime.
customer_reviews.author: Nina B.

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This phone is not worth your money. I bought it almost a month ago and it freezes and shuts itself off. It does these things during simple tasks like making calls and using the web browser. This phone also has a very short battery life. It is constantly telling me that my SD card is full and will not let me take photos although I have deleted all of the photos from my SD card. I put my SD card in a different phone. And it showed the actual space left on it. I reset the phone many times and nothing has changed.

product_meta.title: Kyocera Hydro C5170 PrePaid - Boost Mobile (discontinued by manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
IMPORTANT NOTE:This phone is discontinued by manufacturer, and can no longer be able to be activated by Boost Mobile.Experience the Internet on the go with this black Kyocera Hydro smartphone for Boost Mobile. Powered by a 1 GHz processor, this 2 GB Kyocera Hydro smartphone has a 3.2 MP camera with LED flash and geotagging. This Kyocera smartphone has an Android 4.0 operating system, offers 2 GB of internal memory, and is waterproof. This Kyocera Hydro smartphone has an Internet browser and a YouTube player, so users can watch their favorite videos and surf the Internet. GPS positioning and navigation make this Kyocera smartphone a must-have for people who travel frequently. This 2 GB Kyocera Hydro smartphone has a phonebook with unlimited entries and can search the phonebook by first or last name. Other features of this Kyocera Hydro smartphone include a calendar, an alarm, a calculator, and this smartphone supports instant messaging with Google Talk. Supported email platforms include IMAP, POP3, and SMTP. This smartphone is ideal for those who text frequently, since it supports predictive text input for faster and more accurate messaging.



AMAZON.COM


(view larger). (view larger). The Kyocera Hydro is sophistication and style in a mainstream Android smartphone that can work for everyone. Plus it offers water-resistance, giving consumers the “no-fear” durability and security they demand. With a 3.5 inch HVGA touchscreen, 3.2 MP camera and video, and Android 4.0, you get the best of all worlds.

Other features also include visual voicemail which allows you to find the messages you're looking for without having to listen to all those calls you ignored. Google Play gives you a one stop shop for apps, games, movies, music, and books. Stay in the loop with friends and family with multimedia, IM, and text messaging. It also includes Bluetooth where you can take calls and listen to music without wires and share files over the air.

ANDROID ICE CREAM SANDWICH OPERATING SYSTEM
The Kyocera Hydro runs the Android 4.0 operating system (dubbed Ice Cream Sandwich), which adds powerful new ways of communicating and sharing while improving on the best Android features: easy multitasking, rich notifications, customizable home screens, resizable widgets, and more. The updated Ice Cream Sandwich interface features an onscreen navigation bar that replaces the hardware buttons for Back, Home, and Menu found with older Android-powered phones. 

KEY FEATURES
 * Android 4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich)
 * Android Apps on Google Play
 * Waterproof (IPX5 and IPX7 supported)
 * 3.5” Touchscreen Display
 * EVDO Rev A / Wi-Fi Enabled
 * GPS Enabled
 * 3.2MP Camera with Flash and Video Camera 
 * Bluetooth
 * 1 GHz Processor
 * External memory: up to 32 GB (2 GB Card included)
 * Headset: 3.5 mm
 * HAC: M4/T4

VITAL STATISTICS
The Kyocera Hydro weighs 4.23 ounces and measures 4.53 x 2.44 x .5 inches. The 1500 mAh battery allows for talk time up to 3.3 hours.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Kyocera Hydro handset, 1500 mAh battery, travel charger head, USB cable, 2 GB microSD card, and printed materials






ABOUT BOOST MOBILE
Boost Mobile redefines value for wireless consumers with its Monthly Unlimited with Shrinkage no-contract service where the longer you stay the less you pay with on-time payments for unlimited voice, text messaging, web, e-mail, IM and calls to 411. It offers nationwide service on the Nationwide Sprint Network and Nextel National Network, reaching more than 278 million people, with no activation or long-distance fees.

Plans include:

$55 Android Monthly Unlimited for unlimited nationwide talk, text, web, e-mail, and 411 with no contracts on an Android powered device. Includes access to Android Market. Voicemail, long distance and call waiting included. And you'll reduce your monthly payment the longer you stay with Shrinkage.

$2 Daily Unlimited provides all the value of Monthly Unlimited and nationwide coverage at a low daily rate. The $2 subscription charge is automatically deducted from your Boost account each day after midnight, regardless of usage, unless the you cancel the subscription. Recharge at least once every 90 days to keep your account active (after 90 days any credit balance will expire).

International Connect provides unlimited international talk and text with family and friends around the world. It can be added to Monthly Unlimited and Android Monthly Unlimited plans for an additional $5 per month, and added to the BlackBerry Monthly Unlimited plan for $10 per month.

BOOST SHRINKAGE
All Monthly Unlimited plans include Shrinkage and unlimited nationwide talk, text, web, e-mail, and 411. Shrinkage reduces your payment by $5/month for every six on-time payments, up to $15/month in total. Android Monthly Unlimited to as low as $40/month.

ON-TIME PAYMENTS
On-time payments are made on or before the monthly payment date. Your monthly payment date remains the same every month as long as you successfully make your monthly payment. However, if you make a late payment, your payment date will be reset to the day of the month before the date your service is restored (e.g., if your service is restored on February 15th, your monthly payment date will be reset to March 14th).

MISSED PAYMENT
While it's best to make regular on-time payments each month, payments do not have to be consecutive. If you miss a payment you don't have to start over. The on-time payments made to the account will still be available as well as any savings milestone achieved.
feature_bullets: Carrier: Discontinued by manufacturer, no longer able to activate by Boost Mobile
